name: places/ChIJJ0bQdJ1ZwokRQH2acJS8nI0
formattedAddress: 408 E 9th St, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 408 E 9th St, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text: Yuki is amazing! I absolutely LOVE my haircut! It’s so hard to find a place that’s not crazy expensive for curly hair in the city, but on top of that he was SO attentive and kind. I came in for a bit of a dramatic change and he took the time to talk me through it and we settled on what would look best. Would def recommend him for curly cuts, he does layers so well!!

I came in for a bit of a dramatic change and he took the time to talk me through it and we settled on what would look best. Would def recommend him for curly cuts, he does layers so well!!

originalText.text: Yuki is a very talented hair salon. I love how my hair looks and he gave me the cut that I wanted! Highly recommend this salon — thank you!

text.text: Yuki is a very talented hair salon. I love how my hair looks and he gave me the cut that I wanted! Highly recommend this salon — thank you!

originalText.text: Yuki is such a wonderful, expert hairstylist! He is very kind, thoughtful, and careful-- he looked at my photos and asked me great questions about my preferences.He communicated each step with me to make sure I got a very high quality hair cut and the perfect color that suited my style and wavy/curly hair. I always enjoy spending time in his salon listening to his great music selection and enjoying the peaceful space. He also gave an expert men's cut to my boyfriend. I highly recommend Tsumiki salon!

text.text: Yuki is such a wonderful, expert hairstylist! He is very kind, thoughtful, and careful-- he looked at my photos and asked me great questions about my preferences.He communicated each step with me to make sure I got a very high quality hair cut and the perfect color that suited my style and wavy/curly hair. I always enjoy spending time in his salon listening to his great music selection and enjoying the peaceful space. He also gave an expert men's cut to my boyfriend. I highly recommend Tsumiki salon!

originalText.text: Thank you Yuki for making time last minute for an appointment to do my hair! I loved how it turned out! It was simple and elegant and held up for the evening. I really appreciated the attention to detail and opinions you shared, asking about my dress, jewelry, etc I was going to wear to make sure my hair was going to look great from the bigger picture. Thank you again! I don't live in New York currently but would come back given the opportunity!

text.text: Thank you Yuki for making time last minute for an appointment to do my hair! I loved how it turned out! It was simple and elegant and held up for the evening. originalText.text: I had a great experience at Tsumiki. I asked for a scalp treatment with shoulder massage and a blow dry. Hiro was fantastic. She’s a very experienced hair stylist. For the scalp treatment, Hiro applied an oil she prepares with lotus flowers  that  has a very subtle and soothing fragrance. It’s a very relaxing experience that calms your senses and your scalp and shoulders feel rejuvenated. She styled my hair beautifully too applying excellent hair products as well. Yuki is also very welcoming. Their prices are also excellent and the vintage decor makes this small salon very cozy. I’ll definitely visit them again soon for root touch up and hair cut.
